All You - March 2015  USA

104 Pages | True PDF | English | 22 MB

Each issue features simple, crowd-pleasing recipes that use easy-to-find and inexpensive ingredients, affordable fashion for real women's bodies, and diet and fitness tips for busy women.

American Cake Decorating - April 2015  USA

72 Pages | True PDF | English | 13 MB

American Cake Decorating magazine is for professionals and serious enthusiasts that want to learn best practices from top professionals in the cake, pastry and chocolate world. We feature ideas from the top international competitions, intricate tutorials, recipes, success stories, chef interviews.
